titleStmt.title: The arraignment and conuiction of vsurie That is, The iniquitie, and vnlawfulnes of vsurie, displayed in sixe sermons, preached at Saint Edmunds Burie in Suffolke, vpon Prouerb. 28.8. By Miles Mosse, minister of the worde, and Bacheler of Diuinitie. Seene and allowed by authoritie. The especiall contents of this booke, are declared in the page next before the treatise it self. Reade all, or censure none.
titleStmt.author: Mosse, Miles, fl. 1580-1614.

titleStmt.title: The arraignment and conuiction of vsurie That is, The iniquitie, and vnlawfulnes of vsurie, displayed in sixe sermons, preached at Saint Edmunds Burie in Suffolke, vpon Prouerb. 28.8. By Miles Mosse, minister of the worde, and Bacheler of Diuinitie. Seene and allowed by authoritie. The especiall contents of this booke, are declared in the page next before the treatise it self. Reade all, or censure none.
titleStmt.author: Mosse, Miles, fl. 1580-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the widdow Orwin, for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: A variant (STC 18208) names J. Porter as publisher in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
